      Reading group on Topics in Entropy Zero Dynamics

      Future talks

      • 06/06/24   Przemysłav Berk and Frank Trujillo,  Ergodicity of skew-products over typical IETs

      • 02/05/24   Guest talk: Irene Pasquinelli,  Mapping class group orbit closures for non-orientable surfaces 2
